product.name: 478 Range Rider Denim
product.description:
Product Details

Come in 3 sizes: Small - Medium - Large

  • Made for Mig/Stick Welding
  • Split cowhide leather
  • Stitched with Kevlar® thread for strength and durability
  • Cutshield™ P-aramid/steel/polyester liner
  • Full leather index finger and inset thumb
  • Gauntlet style cuff
  • Snug-fitting shirred elastic wrist
  • Meets ANSI/ISEA 105-2016 Heat level 2
